Magic Notes:
Abjuration: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Protective Ward spell
Advanced School Spell: Knows the Shifting Form spell/+1 Focus Points
Arcane School: Has a Focus Pool with 1 Focus Point
Archwizard's Might: +1 10th level spell slot
Archwizard's Spellcraft: Has 1 10th-level spell slot
Conjuration: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Augment Summoning spell
Divination: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Diviner's Sight spell
Enchantment: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Charming Words spell
Evocation: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Force Bolt spell
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Arcane)
Hand Of The Apprentice: Knows the Hand Of The Apprentice spell/Has a Focus Pool with 1 Focus Point
Illusion: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Warped Terrain spell
Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Arcane)
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Arcane)
Necromancy: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Call Of The Grave spell
Transmutation: +1 spell slot each level/Knows the Physical Boost spell
Universal Versatility: +1 Focus Points
Abjuration: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Abjuration spell
Arcane Bond: May use Drain Bonded Item to cast an expended spell using power stored in a possession 1/dy
Arcane Spellcasting: May learn spells from the Arcane tradition
Bespell Weapon: Casting a spell causes a wielded weapon to inflict +1d6 HP until end of turn; damage type depends on spell school
Bizarre Magic: Self spells require +5 DC to Recognize Spells and Identify Magic
Bond Conservation: May use Drain Bonded Item to cast another spell 2 levels lower within 1 rd
Bonded Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Cantrip Expansion: May prepare two additional cantrips each dy
Clever Counterspell: May Counterspell with a -2 penalty a known spell using any spell that shares its school and another trait
Conjuration: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Conjuration spell
Counterspell: May use a Reaction and expend a spell slot to counteract a spell with the same spell
Divination: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Divination spell
Effortless Concentration: May extend the duration of 1 spell as a free action
Enchantment: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Enchantment spell
Eschew Materials: Does not need material components to cast spells
Evocation: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Evocation spell
Illusion: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Illusion spell
Infinite Possibilities: May designate a spell slot to allow casting of any known spell of 2 levels lower
Linked Focus: Draining a bonded item to cast a spell restores 1 Focus Point
Magic Sense: Has continuous Detect Magic effects
Metamagic Mastery: May use a 1-action metamagic effect as a free action
Metamagical Experimentation: May select 1 metamagic feat of up to level 10 to use each day
Necromancy: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Necromancy spell
Overwhelming Energy: May have spells ignore resistance 20 to choice of energy
Quickened Casting: Reduces the time required to cast a spell of level 8 or lower by 1 action
Reach Spell: May extend spell range by 30'
Reflect Spell: May have a successful Counterspell on a targeted spell inflict the spell effects on the caster
Reprepare Spell: May spend 10 min to prepare a cast spell or another spell of the same level
Scroll Savant: May prepare 4 temporary scrolls with spells up to level 9 each dy
Silent Spell: Does not need verbal components to cast spells
Spell Blending: May use 2 spell slots from a level to prepare a spell two levels higher/May use a spell slot to prepare 2 cantrips
Spell Combination: May use 1 spell slot of each level to cast two spells of 2 levels lower
Spell Penetration: Targets reduce any status bonus to saves vs. self spells by 1
Spell Substitution: May use a 10-minute process to replace 1 prepared spell with a different spell
Spell Tinker: May alter effect choice of a spell cast on self
Steady Spellcasting: A successful DC 15 flat check negates self spellcasting disruption
Stonewalker: May cast Meld Into Stone 1/dy
Superior Bond: May use Drain Bonded Item to cast another spell up to level 9 1/dy
Transmutation: Knows 1 additional 1st-level Transmutation spell
Universal Versatility: May select a school spell during daily preparations and Refocus
Universalist: May use Drain Bonded Item 1/spell level/Knows 1 additional 1st-level spell
Widen Spell: May increase the effect of a 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', and the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
